definition: to take the lid off/to expose/to unmask

sentences.english: Able to reveal weaknesses in the structure in order to optimize the structure design.
sentences.chinese: 能夠揭示出結構的薄弱環節，以利於優化結構設計。

sentences.english: The discovery also reveals how male squid compete for female mating partners.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現也揭示了雄性烏賊如何爭奪交配伴侶的。
又譯爲自我開放或自我揭示。

sentences.english: Tests, such as a computed tomography (CT) scan, may also reveal signs of injury.
sentences.chinese: 計算機斷層掃描等檢測也可能揭示損傷跡象。

sentences.english: Contact the old knowledge, revealing new lesson.
Another area of interest to the study of decision-making revolves around sleep deprivation.
sentences.chinese: 另一個研究揭示了決策力跟睡眠不足有關。

sentences.english: What the chart reveals is indeed thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 圖表揭示的內容確實令人深思。

sentences.english: It indicated that high Iodine drinking water seriously affect children's intelligence as same as low Iodine drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 揭示高碘和低碘一樣，對兒童智力有嚴重影響。

sentences.english: However, the following facts about Somali society suggestsome reality of statelessness.
sentences.chinese: 不管如何，以下事實揭示了一些無國籍的真相。

sentences.english: How to reveal the interreaction of specific industry and its intra- industry trade?
sentences.chinese: 如何揭示特定產業及其產業內貿易的相互關係？

sentences.english: The aim was to reveal the evolutions of soil environment quality around Huashan scenic spots and its pollution characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 揭示花山景區附近土壤環境質量演變狀況及污染特點。

sentences.english: The genetic-mechanism of optimal depth and stable points was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 揭示了最佳埋深和穩定點的形成機理。

sentences.english: Davison chart tells about the relationship as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 戴維森盤從整體上揭示出這段關係。

sentences.english: An overhead view of the south stairs reveals the deference of the stairway to the topography.
sentences.chinese: 南部臺階的頂視圖揭示了這些踏步對於地形的尊重。

sentences.english: Thus the physical meaning of logarithmic spiral mathematics is well described.
sentences.chinese: 從而揭示了數學上等角螺線的物理意義。

sentences.english: This meant the wing did not have a ring finger.
sentences.chinese: 這揭示了爲什麼翼部沒有長出無名指。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
